name: Barbecued Ribs
preparation: Place ribs in shallow roasting pan, meaty side up. Place lemon slices over all. Roast for 30 minutes.
Combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a simmer and pour over ribs.
Reduce temperature to 350° F (175° C) and continue cooking an additional 30–40 minutes, until ribs are knife-tender. Baste ribs with sauce every 15 minutes. If sauce gets too thick, add more water.
tips: Prepare ribs ahead of time and save sauce. Grill ribs, occasionally brushing with sauce, for 3–5 minutes per side. Reheat remaining sauce and toss ribs to coat.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.
